questions: What is the effect of an increase in concentration of H+ ions ? 1 M HCl or 1 M CH3COOH.
answers: 1 M HCl has a higher concentration of H+ ions, because when HCl dissolves in water it dissociates completely into ions while CH3COOH is a weak acid and does not dissociate into ions completely.

questions: Why does tooth decay start when the pH of mouth is lower than 5.5 ?

questions: How is the concentration of hydronium ions (H3O+) affected, when a solution of an acid is diluted ?
